mods.note: E J D (9 SKETCH MAP TO ACCOMPANY REPORT ON TRADE OF BAHREIN ISLANDS *

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'SKETCH MAP TO ACCOMPANY REPORT ON TRADE OF BAHREIN ISLANDS'

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: A pencil number, enclosed in a circle, is located in the top right hand corner of the recto of the folio.Materials: 1 parchment sheetDimensions: 245 x 160 mm

mods.abstract: Sketch Map showing Bahrain's location in the Persian Gulf in relation to Qatar and Saudi Arabia.The map was reproduced from the Ordnance Survey, Southampton 1915.
